description:
-> 10 fabulous games including the full sing along in one great kids app!
-> 11 beautiful verses of the classic “The Wheels on the Bus” song!
-> Adorable HD graphics and sounds
-> Top selling education app worldwide
-> Selected New and Noteworthy by Apple!

An all in one activity center for children - complete child safe phone environment.

Come and enjoy the classic song with your little ones. With 11 beautiful and colorful verses filled with fun interactions your children will play and learn at the same time! 

INTERACTIVE SING ALONG
The classic “Wheels on the Bus” children song comes to life in an animated, interactive rich song and dance experience.
~ Rich animations and activities on all pages
~ Full sing along
~ HD quality graphics and sounds

COLORING BOOK
Enjoy The Wheels on the Bus coloring page and learn the different names of transportation vehicles.
~ Select between 40+ different colors
~ Fill area with paint bucket
~ Interactive, animated drawing activities
~ Learn spelling and vocabulary

HORN PIANO
Play and record your own music with the 5 different sets of horns on the honk piano.
~  5 Sets of Horns: Boat, Truck, Beetle Car, Train, Sedan
~ Learn horn sounds 

CAR RACE
The happy race is on, select your car and race with 10 colorful cars in a vivid racing track. Tap your car to make it drive faster, the more you tap the faster it will drive. 
~ Develop fine motor skills
~ Fun animations and sounds
~ Happy and cheerful environment

HAPPY BUS MATH
Five unique preschool math games. Presented with adorable cars that make learning basic concepts of math so much fun. Learn about counting, numbers, larger, smaller and more. A constructive environment where children can’t go wrong and receive positive feedback which encourages them to learn and improve
~ 5 different math games
~ Constructive environment
~ Intuitive learning process

TINY TRAIN
All aboard! Join the vehicle train! Learn about vehicle names, voices and vocabulary as you spell the names of the vehicles on the train
~ Fabulous graphics
~ Vocabulary and spelling school

TAP THE CAR
Lets learn vehicle names vehicle has its name, tap on the correct car every turn and move on to the next challenging and fun stage. 
~ Learn vehicle names
~ 10 different cars

VEHICLE PUZZLES
High quality, super fun and simple to master puzzle game, with 12 unique vehicle puzzles. 
~ 12 different interactive puzzles
~ 3 different categories
~ Unique “Magic complete” feature

MEMORY MATCH
Intuitive, educational memory matching games. Match pairs of cars to learn their sounds and names.
~ Improving memory and concentration

BUS RIDE
The bus ride  driving simulator game lets your little ones feel like they are driving a real bus! Pick up all five passengers, while avoiding the road obstacles.
~ Intuitive, fun and child friendly controls
~ HD quality illustrations and sounds

ABOUT TabTale
With over 400 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. TabTale’s interactive storybooks provide an exciting reading experience for the most beloved children's stories. Each book inspires young children’s creativity and imagination.
Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ 
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale
Follow us:@Tabtale
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale

CONTACT US 
Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: 
* This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
* By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.
Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
